summary:
A mod which improves gameplay in skyrim, but no need to worry about mod compatibility, lore friendliness, errors etc.
If you Like it, Plz Endorse
descriptionHtml:
A mod which improves gameplay in skyrim, but no need to worry about mod compatibility, lore friendliness, errors etc.
This mod adds Semi-Unique Npcs in Skyrim.

NewjTravelers.esp: Travelers, Knight of Wealth with golden Armor, Exotic Merchant with rare items and Thu\'um Learner. This esp is for Unique NPCs
NewjHostileDef.esp: Town Militia, Civil Defense,
NewjHostile.esp: Many Bandits attacking towns and cities, New Hostile NPCs, Some unique spells. This esp is for spawns and non unique npcs.

1. Travelers: They usually go to tavern or inn or places in city.
*It\'s in Separate .esp file called NewjTavelers.esp! If you don\'t want it disable it*

2. Civil Defense & Town Militia : CDs are in Dawnstar and Whiterun Exterior to protect people. Town Militia are in Riverwood, Dragonbridge, Ivarstead and Rorikstead.

3. Dogs are just added to make in more live like. They are just normal dogs, sometimes you can see thing like \'Stupid dog\' or \"Good dog\"

4. Knight of Wealth: This is the man you can defeat to get unique golden armor you can upgrade at forge.
*It\'s in Separate .esp file called NewjTavelers.esp!, This guy and his armor will be disabled if you disable the esp file*

5. Hostile Npcs (WIP): Now includes Lots of Bandits and Wild Animals. And Rare werewolf spawns

6. More People

*\"This mod have been Tested with Wars In Skyrim, Crafting Mods for 12 Hours and no Bugs were found\"
\"It may not be compatible with the mod which modifies GuardFaction members etc. There\'s Too much to do when editing voicefiles and dialogues so.. I\'d better not fix that

How To Make a Clean Save
1. Disable the mod (No need to disable every mod, just related mods)
2. Run the game and load the save while the mod is disabled
3. Save and exit

Change log
Version 2.5
*AI Upgrade and changed spawn system and interaction
*Instead of doing random thing in farm Civil Defense(CD) now walk on the roads back and forth
*Added Bows and Iron arrows and removed helmets in all CDs.
*Travelers are now much weaker
*Decreased number of CDs inside the city

Version 2.75
*Added Civil Defense in Dawnstar. Added Town Militia in Dragonbridge and Ivarstead. 
*Add a Merchant that sells some rare things. He travels with his bodyguard. (NewjTravelers.esp) 
*Modified stats for Most of Npcs and now it\'s more balanced. 
*Bandits attacks places where Town Militia and Civil Defenses are present 
*Added Thu\'um Learner, see the screenshot. (NewjTravelers.esp) *not very important* 

If you Like it, Plz Endorse
author: Parkj

files.name: LivingNPCs 2_9
files.changelogHtml:
Much broader AI Path which means much less spawning right next to civilians and safer towns.
Fixed Bugs Such as Winterhold guard Ai and etc

files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Face Tint Problems

Removed dogs
